body.name: Homall L Shaped Gaming Desk Computer Corner Desk PC Gaming Desk Table with Large Monitor Riser Stand for Home Office Sturdy Writing Workstation (Classical Black, 51 Inch)
features: L Shaped Gaming Table: The l shaped design of the new Homall super gaming desk can effectively use the corner space while providing more storage space. Same time, switching to this gaming desk will release the center area of the room and make the activity space wider. Make your game room full of energy.

Super Gaming Style: The amazing carbon fiber material covers the desk, even including the bottom baffle, which makes the whole table full of fabulous gloss and delicate touch. Plus the detail dark red pattern mezzanine and unique z shaped chair legs. Bring you the double enjoyment of vision and touch.

Large Gaming Surface: Designed for gaming, the Homall l gaming table is composed of two large gaming tables with a length of 51 inches (W). In addition to the monitor, mouse, and keyboard, there's plenty of space for other gaming devices, and there is also have enough space for you to operate and enjoy the joy of victory.

Gamer Friendly: The table is equipped with a detachable monitor stand, which can be easily fixed on any table edge according to your needs, even including the corner part. Plus adjustable footpads, reasonable using height, and a stable using environment provide stable support for your gaming equipment and awaken your passion for gaming.

Smiling Customer Service: Homall has a strong after-sales team, providing efficient and professional service for customers is our criterion. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will help you as soon as possible and try our best to solve your problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk was fairly easy to assemble. Took maybe an hour to do alone. It’s pretty lightweight, so it wasn’t difficult at all to move around. I think the red details are cute. It seems to hold weight just fine. The size was perfect, I was worried it would be too big for my space but it fit perfectly. I think the height of the desk is nice, too. It works with a regular chair if you don’t have an adjustable desk chair. The box came with a rip but I didn’t think it damaged anything with all the plastic. When I started assembling, I noticed it did rip through the plastic on the top shelf and damaged it. I haven’t attached the shelf yet, the damage didn’t ruin it entirely. Overall it’s a nice desk for a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, Comfortable, and Very Useful
reviews.reviewText: This desk is very easy to assemble, it should not take longer than maybe one to two hours all by yourself. I am very happy with the product, it has been about two months since I bought it, and I do not regret it. The desk is very firm and not shaky at all. It is also very spacious, and you can adjust the additional space to whichever side you want. The only flaw I experienced is that it tends to quickly get a little dirty, and the marks from your hands can be a little evident. But it is not a huge problem, nothing a wipe cannot solve. But overall, definitely worth it, especially if you would like to study with notebooks and a laptop at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price great product!
reviews.reviewText: Love this desk, looks great, feels great (not like cheaply made), easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, easy to assemble, good price
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy to assemble. Took me longer then a more abled bodied person could, but that's just a testament to it's easiness to assemble. Price was really good for a desk like this. The color is cute and may buy a second in the future. Suits my neednfor more space to work with on a desk. Picture isn't my full setup. Only one con I'd say the little riser thing that goes above the top and is used for monitors. Has nonset holes to screw it into thus making it hard to install. I think when I knownwhere I want it I'll drill holes under the deck for it. Otherwise the screws are just supposed to tighten there I assume, making it not as stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for content creators and live streamers.
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this pink table!!! I am a content creator and about to start my journey of live streaming and needed something roomy and cute. As a college student I am on a budget so I needed to also find something affordable and wow this table was definitely priced super reasonable. I was actually surprised the price wasn’t higher since this table is extraordinary! When I say it’s perfect I really mean this table is perfect! It was easy to assemble and only took about 1 hour and a half with the help of my grandfather. It’s the perfect size and is super roomy. I can fit my laptop and monitor on it and still have room for way more. I love that it comes with an extra shelf to put where ever you please. You do not need to drill it, it’s one of those that you can screw down tight to the table and then unscrew and move to a new desired spot without having to make holes in your brand new table! The table itself is super smooth and it’s very durable. I am extremely pleased with this purchase and highly recommend this table for any gamer girls out there looking for a pink table or people who are looking for a roomy table that holds all their tech stuff. This is definitely the best fit for someone who spends a lot of time at their desk and needs room for more than just a computer and a keyboard. You have room to write down things on one side, type in the middle and a whole other side to do whatever. Highly recommend!!!! Seriously cannot beat this deal for the price!!! It’s perfect for me as a tall woman I have tons of leg room. I am 5’8ft 1/2inch and have tons of leg room! I added a power strip extension cord outlet holder to my table to keep the cords and the plugs off the floor and be more organized this way. There is so much you can do with this table and I love that I didn’t have to pay a fortune to get an extremely high quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son for Christmas. It is good size, we'll made and my son put it together with ease. Perfect for his room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great desk. but
reviews.reviewText: its a great desk it holds up great but wiggles too much I would recommend to anchor it to a wall so the screens you might have on it stops shaking. My monitors are shaking as I'm typing this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its so beautiful
reviews.reviewText: its exactly what we wanted. it was very easy to put together. my ONLY concern is the mini shelf is not as secure as we were hoping for it to be, because the screws barely fit and there aren’t any holes in the desk for them. otherwise everything fit and the desk is very sturdy
Me gusto que ha sido muy fácil armarlo y es de buena calidad!
Fácil de armar, sólido y cumple lo que promete. El único problema es que sí es muy ligero y si no tienes cosas pesadas encima que le den estabilidad cualquier empujón lo va a mover de su lugar.
